alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:59PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas, northwestern Elbert, western Arapahoe, southern Denver and south central Adams Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 159 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over western Centennial, or 11 miles southeast of Denver, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Denver, Aurora, eastern Centennial, Parker, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree, Watkins, The Pinery, Manila Village, Buckley SFB and Arapahoe Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
